channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Yen rallies as dollar drops rapidly, stock futures losing steam
Trump trade advisor says stock market plunge 'No big deal': Live updates
item.description: President Donald Trump's 145% tariffs on China are reshaping global trade dynamics and regional alliances.

item.title: China hikes U.S. tariff rate to 125% but declares it won't lift them further
Supreme Court rules U.S. must facilitate return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia from El Salvador
item.description: The Trump administration argues that Kilmar Abrego Garcia is a member of the notorious MS-13 gang. The El Salvador native denies that claim.

item.title: EU trade chief heading to Washington for talks
Meet the sneaker lovers stockpiling $220 shoes before tariffs raise prices
Stock-market extremes are the norm now. ‘The key is to not get emotional.’
Trump tariffs: 'Do not retaliate and you will be rewarded,' White House says
item.description: President Donald Trump's tariffs on nearly all U.S. trade partners will drop to 10% for 90 days, but tariffs on China will jump to 125%.

item.title: Ray Dalio says Trump should negotiate a 'win-win' trade deal with China
item.description: The Bridgewater founder also advised investors to rethink their risk appetite after U.S. tariffs policies sparked wild swings in financial markets.

item.title: Trump temporarily drops tariffs to 10% for most countries, hits China harder with 125%
item.description: The U.S. stock market, which had suffered since President Trump unveiled his tariff plan, rose sharply after he announced a pause to allow negotiation...
